replies.body: Hi! All those skins you mentioned were left off the early sales list by accident. We'll be amending the article shortly.
How long does it take to amend an article?
star guardian early sale got announced, but now theres no mention of the battle boss skins- when is their early sale?
when are omega squad on early sale?
They were on the January early sales list.
So they will go on sale at some point later this month?
Yes.
same
When DJ Sona will be on sale?.I'm waiting for that so long..:({{champion:37}} {{sticker:cass-cry}}
I'm pretty sure that ultimate skins only go on sale once a few months after their release, then I don't think they'll ever go on sale again.

^ This ^
Skins that cost 1820 or more go on sale _once_ and never again.
Your options are pretty much "buy it as-is" or "hope for a Shard from chest (and then save up a ton of Essense)"
I pulled dj sona
ooo I feel so lucky.. When it FIRST came out it was on sale and I got it right away, like Feb 2016

I might get that SG Syndra skin.
{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
I have no regrets buying First Star bundles for Ahri and Raka {{sticker:sg-kiko}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
Gonna have to pick up Atlantean {{champion:134}}

Star Guardian Ahri Sale? Alas, Riot, you are too late. 

https://i.imgur.com/IU0sSxd.png

Ahri and I parted ways 2 months ago. I now walk an edgier path.
New to League so I'm not really sure how this works. Do all the champions go on sale during the first week or is this a slow roll out in a random order?

I'm pretty sure you've figured it out by now, but as I have noticed champions rotate their sale in increments from Monday to Friday, then  Friday to Monday over the entire month, the same goes for the skins, but Early Sales on newer skins occur at the end of the month I believe.
When do the Early Sales usually happen (for the Star Guardian Skins)?
Towards the end of the month.
Last weekend of the month usually
When are the valentines skins going to come up!! I want them so badly!! {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Right?? I've been waiting for Sweetheart Sona to become available for AGES!
The monthly sales preview only cares about the "normal" sales. It does not list "event" sales.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}} on Valentines or a week before.
wait what about the battle boss skins?
Will there be a bundle for the new Swain and his skins?
RIP my wallet...
Lovely
its already february when does the early sales start or did i already miss it . because i've been on everyday and none of the star guardian skins have been on sale
You can normally figure this out by yourself, since it's been the same process for years now. But, it normally happens in the near end of the month.
when is high noon yasuo, muai thai lee sin, or forsaken jayce be on sale {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
what day do the early sales start
It appears we have an extra 975 this month instead of the standard six 750 skins that normally go up in a 4 week period. Very unusual.
When will viktor be on sale again?
Is Mighty Jax going to be available? It is tradition to release it during the Winter Olympics.
This.... IS THE GREATEST SALES MONTH EVER!!!
when are the warring kingdoms skins coming back out (Azir)???
Morgana skin and a brand skin. I know someone that will be a happy player on that. Too bad they won't be happy with current game play.
These early sales will kill my wallet. Good stuff Riot.
{{sticker:sg-lux}} SO MANY SALE BUT I HAVE NO MORE MONEY
when are the warring kingdoms skins coming back out (Azir)????
where the diana skin sales at riot?
I have reaper soraka and star guardian... I guess its time for Celestine now.
No Singed skins? ):
Any thoughts of a Sugar Rush sale any time in the future. I need to give you my money. PLZ {{sticker:vlad-salute}}
